title: Animation in the school classroom
creator_credit: Alexander Milsky and Alex Milsky Productions
brief_description: A very detailed film showing students and teachers how animation is possible with a minimum of equipment. It gives advice on what paper to use, methods of production, importance of teamwork, advantages of experiment, how to make a light box, how to make an animation table and the requirements of the camera. Suitable for secondary years 7-12.
